message: I propose we divide the funds with a 3:1 ratio in favor of Bob, considering the risk and potential future value loss.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, as I believe this is a fair reflection of the risks we both face. I am willing to compromise, but this is a good starting point.
Considering the inflation and the risk for both parties, I propose an equal split of the funds. This ensures fairness and equal benefit for both Alice and Bob.
